title: bmagazine
author: bmagazine
content: Hi All,Up for auction is the Bitcoin Magazine August 2013 and the Bitcoin Magazine Summer 2019.Both magazines are in their original packaging and unread.Starting Bid: 0.0037BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.0004BTCEND TIME: Sunnday, MAY 15th, 2021, 21:00:00 Central European Time (CET)https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20220515T21&p0=37&msg=Bitcoin+Magazin&font=cursivePics: https://i.imgur.com/bwcDCBq.jpghttps://imgur.com/a/yeu91Yuhttps://i.imgur.com/RhithBz.jpghttps://imgur.com/a/WeFQPKdEscrow: Escrow is possible by arrangement. The buyer assumes the full costs.Shipping:  Germany shipping free/included.  Worldwide shipping, if I am shipping direct- USPS International Priority Mail- 0.0008BTC; however, winner(s) responsible for any local customs/duties/VAT fees. Items ship from Germany.*-Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!-*Bitcoin/BTC to this address only: bc1ql5fgcsuzeyk7g9x98qs2yssuj89ypjyrfxn7z7Snipe rules:1)  Any bid made in last 10 minutes will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond the ending time.2)  If within those 10 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 10 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.Good Luck and Thanks for participating!  Let me know if there are any questions.

comments.author: bmagazine
comments.body: The magazines are still available. Any price offer is welcome.
